metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, PHP, Python, Bootstrap, Java and XML.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: To declare more than one variable of the same type , use a comma-separated list:
content.html: To declare more than one variable of the same type, use a comma-separated list:

content.code:
int
x
=

5
,
y
=

6
,
z
=

50
;


Console
.
WriteLine
(
x
+
y
+
z
)
;
content.code_html:
int x = 5, y = 6, z = 50;
Console.WriteLine(x + y + z);

content.text: You can also assign the same value to multiple variables in one line:
content.html: You can also assign the same value to multiple variables in one line:

content.code:
int
x
,
y
,
z
;

x
=
y
=
z
=

50
;


Console
.
WriteLine
(
x
+
y
+
z
)
;
content.code_html:
int x, y, z;
x = y = z = 50;
Console.WriteLine(x + y + z);

content.text: Exercise ? What is this? Test your skills by answering a few questions about the topics of this page
How can you declare multiple variables of the same type in one line?
content.html: How can you declare multiple variables of the same type in one line?
